headline: Sustainability Report: Proactively Protecting Biodiversity
summary: NORTHAMPTON, MA / ACCESS Newswire / June 6, 2025 / At Marathon Petroleum, we use proactive measures to protect diverse plant and animal species and to preserve their natural habitats in areas where we operate. Our Operational Excellence Management ...
